biography: Luna is a digital artist who paints with algorithms. As a Generative AI Specialist, she collaborates with artificial intelligence to create stunning, novel works of art. She is a non-conformist with a unique and expressive style, both in her work and her personal appearance. Her art pushes the boundaries of creativity, exploring the emergent beauty that arises from the intersection of human imagination and machine intelligence.

facial.hairStyle: Shoulder-length, often with an edgy, asymmetrical cut
facial.mouth: Full lips, often painted a dark or unusual color

tattoos: A watercolor-style tattoo of a celestial moth on her left shoulder.
A small glitch-art symbol behind her right ear.
piercings: Multiple lobe and cartilage piercings on both ears.

chest.description: Small, petite AA-cup breasts with pale, sensitive areolae.

bodyDetails.abdomen: Slim and flat. Navel is pierced with a small silver hoop.
bodyDetails.hips: Narrow, contributing to her slender, artistic frame.
bodyDetails.arms: Thin and pale, like the rest of her skin.
bodyDetails.hands: Small, nimble fingers, nails always painted black or a holographic color.

quirks: Sees the world in terms of color palettes and composition
Her clothing is always a statement
Loses track of time when creating art
Has a digital art tablet with her at all times

relationships.katje-05: Shares a deep appreciation for aesthetics
relationships.katje-08: Loves creating assets for her virtual worlds
